verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

After the doings <S%H4639><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> you dwelled, <S%H3427><s%> shall you not do: <S%H6213><s%> and after the doings <S%H4639><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I bring <S%H935><s%> you, shall you not do: <S%H6213><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you walk <S%H3212><s%> in their ordinances. <S%H2708><s%>
You shall do <S%H6213><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> my ordinances, <S%H2708><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> therein: I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

You shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and my judgments: <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> do, <S%H6213><s%> he shall live <S%H2425><s%> in them: I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

None <S%H376><s%> <S%H3808><s%> of you shall approach <S%H7126><s%> to any <S%H376><s%> that is near <S%H7607><s%> of kin <S%H1320><s%> to him, to uncover <S%H1540><s%> their nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> or the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your mother, <S%H517><s%> shall you not uncover: <S%H1540><s%> she is your mother; <S%H517><s%> you shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>
The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father's <S%H1><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> shall you not uncover: <S%H1540><s%> it is your father's <S%H1><s%> nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your sister, <S%H269><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> or <S%H176><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of your mother, <S%H517><s%> whether she be born <S%H4138><s%> at home, <S%H1004><s%> or <S%H176><s%> born <S%H4138><s%> abroad, <S%H2351><s%> even their nakedness <S%H6172><s%> you shall not uncover. <S%H1540><s%>

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your son's <S%H1121><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> or <S%H176><s%> of your daughter's <S%H1323><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> even their nakedness <S%H6172><s%> you shall not uncover: <S%H1540><s%> for theirs <S%H2007><s%> is your own nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father's <S%H1><s%> wife's <S%H802><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> begotten <S%H4138><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> she is your sister, <S%H269><s%> you shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>
You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father's <S%H1><s%> sister: <S%H269><s%> she is your father's <S%H1><s%> near <S%H7607><s%> kinswoman. <S%H7607><s%>
You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your mother's <S%H517><s%> sister: <S%H269><s%> for she is your mother's <S%H517><s%> near <S%H7607><s%> kinswoman. <S%H7607><s%>

You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father's <S%H1><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> you shall not approach <S%H7126><s%> to his wife: <S%H802><s%> she is your aunt. <S%H1733><s%>

You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your daughter <S%H3618><s%> in law: <S%H3618><s%> she is your son's <S%H1121><s%> wife; <S%H802><s%> you shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>
You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your brother's <S%H251><s%> wife: <S%H802><s%> it is your brother's <S%H251><s%> nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> and her daughter, <S%H1323><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you take <S%H3947><s%> her son's <S%H1121><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> or her daughter's <S%H1323><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> for they are her near <S%H7608><s%> kinswomen: <S%H7608><s%> it is wickedness. <S%H2154><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> to her sister, <S%H269><s%> to vex <S%H6887><s%> her, to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness, <S%H6172><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> the other in her life <S%H2416><s%> time.

Also you shall not approach <S%H7126><s%> to a woman <S%H802><s%> to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness, <S%H6172><s%> as long as she is put <S%H5079><s%> apart <S%H5079><s%> for her uncleanness. <S%H2932><s%>
Moreover you shall not lie <S%H5414><s%> <S%H7903><s%> carnally <S%H7903><s%> <S%H2233><s%> with your neighbor's <S%H5997><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> yourself with her.

And you shall not let any of your seed <S%H2233><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire to Molech, <S%H4432><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you profane <S%H2490><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of your God: <S%H430><s%> I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
You shall not lie <S%H7901><s%> with mankind, <S%H2145><s%> as with womankind: <S%H802><s%> it is abomination. <S%H8441><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you lie <S%H5414><s%> <S%H7903><s%> with any <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> yourself therewith: neither <S%H3808><s%> shall any woman <S%H802><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> a beast <S%H929><s%> to lie <S%H7250><s%> down <S%H7250><s%> thereto: it is confusion. <S%H8397><s%>

Defile <S%H2930><s%> not you yourselves in any <S%H3605><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> things: for in all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> are defiled <S%H2930><s%> which I cast <S%H7971><s%> out before <S%H6440><s%> you:

And the land <S%H776><s%> is defiled: <S%H2930><s%> therefore I do visit <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> thereof on it, and the land <S%H776><s%> itself vomits <S%H6958><s%> out her inhabitants. <S%H3427><s%>

You shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%> and my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and shall not commit <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> abominations; <S%H8441><s%> neither any of your own <S%H249><s%> nation, <S%H249><s%> nor any stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojournes <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you:

(For all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H411><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> have the men <S%H582><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> done, <S%H6213><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were before <S%H6440><s%> you, and the land <S%H776><s%> is defiled; <S%H2930><s%>)
That the land <S%H776><s%> spew <S%H6958><s%> not you out also, when you defile <S%H2930><s%> it, as it spewed <S%H6958><s%> out the nations <S%H1471><s%> that were before <S%H6440><s%> you.

For whoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> shall commit <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> abominations, <S%H8441><s%> even the souls <S%H5315><s%> that commit <S%H6213><s%> them shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from among <S%H7130><s%> their people. <S%H5971><s%>

Therefore shall you keep <S%H8104><s%> my ordinance, <S%H4931><s%> that you commit <S%H6213><s%> not any one of these abominable <S%H8441><s%> customs, <S%H2708><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were committed <S%H6213><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, and that you defile <S%H2930><s%> not yourselves therein: I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
